content:
## Engine Terms of Use

To ensure that this engine and other users of it stay safe, please follow these guidelines:

- Do not recreate and publish large portions of DELTARUNE content. *(This includes, but is not limited to, full areas, boss battles, or other significant parts of the game. Recreating mechanics is fine, but not large chunks of content. If youâ€™re unsure, please check with a developer.)*
- Do not create illegal or harmful content using this engine. *(Examples include malware, doxxing tools, or other similar malicious software.)*
- Always credit the engine. *(This engine was made by a team of volunteers. Please make sure to respect their work.)*

You are free to create what you like, but we will protect the integrity of this engine in spaces we control. Failure to comply with these terms may result in us requesting that you take down your project.

-# Note: These terms are not yet public outside of this tag, but they must still be followed at all times.
